overview: Porn legend Ginger Lynn is the sexy centerpiece of this scorching compilation, starring in each and every scene of erotic abandon. The video is a collection of segments culled from Ginger's various early 80s island adventures like 'Surrender in Paradise' and 'The Pink Lagoon.' Each one sparkles with the passion and enthusiasm that only Ginger Lynn could provide. Her scrumptious all-natural curves are on dazzling display as she romps her way through nine scenes of utter sexual abandon.
title: Ginger's Hawaiian Scrapbook
